Verses: 1 onbadhaam Varusham Paththaam Maadham Paththaanthedhiyile Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
2 manupuththirane, Indha Naalin Peraiyum Indhath Thedhiyaiyum Nee Ezhudhivai, Indhath Thedhiyildhaane Baabilon Raajaa Erusalemil Paalayamiranginaan.

3 ippodhum Nee Kalagaveettaarukku Oru Ubamaanaththaik Kaanbiththu, Avargalai Nokki: Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal, Oru Kopparaiyai Aduppile Vai; Adhai Aduppile Vaiththu, Adhile Thanneerai Vidu.
4 sagala Nalla Kandangalaana Pinnanthodaigalum Munnanthodaigalumaagiya Kandangalai Serththu Adhile Podu; Nalla Elumbugalaal Adhai Nirappu.
5 aattumandhaiyil Therindhukollappattadhai Adharkaagak Konduvandhu, Elumbugalai Adhin Keezhe Kuviththu Erikkavendum; Adhilulla Elumbugalum Vegaththakkadhaaga Adhaip Pongappongak Kaaichchavendum.

6 idharkaagak Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Adhu Nurai Ottikkondirukkiradhum Nurai Neengaadhadhumaagiya Kopparai Ennappatta Raththanchindhiya Nagaraththukku Aiyo! Adhil Irukkiradhaik Kandankandamaaga Eduththukkondupo; Adhinperil Seettuppodalaagaadhu.
7 aval Raththam Aval Naduvilirukkiradhu; Mannile Maraindhu Pogumpadi Adhaith Tharaiyile Ootraamal Karpaaraiyile Ootrippottaal.
8 needhiyai Sarikkattuvadharkaagak Kobam Moolumpadi Naan Aval Raththaththai Maraikkaamal Kanmalaiyinmel Vaiththen.
9 aadhalaal, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Raththanchindhiya Nagaraththukku Aiyo! Naan Peridhaana Kattaigalaik Kuviththu Eriyappannuven.
10 thiralaana Viragugalaik Koottu, Theeyai Moottu, Iraichchiyai Murugaveviththu Sambaarangalai Idu; Elumbugalai Eriththuppodu.
11 pinbu Kopparai Kaaindhu, Adhin Kalimbu Vendhu, Adharkul Irukkira Adhan Azhukku Urugi, Adhin Nurai Neengumpadi Adhai Verumaiyaagath Thazhalinmel Vai.
12 adhu Magaa Varuththaththai Undaakkiyum, Adhin Thiralaana Nurai Adhai Vittu Neengavillai; Adhin Nurai Akkinikku Ullaaga Vendiyadhu.
13 un Asuththaththode Muraikedum Irukkiradhu; Naan Unnai Suththigariththum, Nee Suththamaagaadhapadiyinaal, Ini En Ukkiram Unnil Aariththeerumattum Un Asuththam Neengi Suththigarikkappadamaattaai.

14 karththaraagiya Naan Idhai Sonnen, Idhu Niraiverum, Naan Idhai Seyven; Naan Pinvaanguvadhum Thappaviduvadhum Manasthaabappaduvadhum Illai; Un Vazhigalukkum Un Seygaigalukkunthakkadhaaga Unnai Nyaayantheerppaargalendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
15 pinnum Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:
16 manupuththirane, Idho, Naan Un Kangalukku Viruppamaanavalai Ore Adiyinaale Unnaivittu Eduththukkolluven; Aanaalum Nee Pulambaamalum Azhaamalum Kanneervidaamalum Iruppaayaaga.

17 alaraamal Perumoochchuvidu, Izhavukondaadavendaam; Un Paagaiyai Un Thalaiyile Katti, Un Paadharatchaigalai Un Paadhangalil Thoduththukkol; Un Thaadiyai Moodaamalum Dhukkankondaadugiravargalin Appaththaip Pusiyaamalum Irukkakkadavaai Endraar.
18 vidiyarkaalaththil Naan Janangalode Pesinen; Andru Saayankaalaththil En Manaivi Seththupponaal; Enakkuk Kattalaiyittapadiye Vidiyarkaalaththil Seydhen.
19 appozhudhu Janangal Ennai Nokki: Neer Seygiravaigal Engalukku Ennaththirku Adaiyaalam Enbadhai Engalukkuth Therivikkamaatteeraa Endru Kettaargal.
20 naan Avargalukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Karththarudaiya Vaarththai Enakku Undaagi, Avar:

21 nee Isravel Veettaarai Nokki, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Uraikkiradhu Ennavendraal Idho, Ungal Balaththin Mukkiyamum Ungal Kangalin Viruppamum Ungal Aaththumaavin Vaanjaiyumaagiya En Parisuththa Sthalaththai Naan Parisuththakkulaichchalaakkugiren; Neengal Vittuvandha Ungal Kumaararum Ungal Kumaaraththigalum Pattayaththaal Vizhuvaargal.
22 appozhudhu Naan Seydhadhupola Neengalum Seyveergal; Thaadiyai Moodaamalum Dhukkankondaadugiravargalin Appaththaip Pusiyaamalum Iruppeergal.

23 ungal Paagaigal Ungal Thalaigalilum, Ungal Paadharatchaigal Ungal Kaalgalilum Irukkum; Neengal Pulambaamalum Azhaamalum Irundhu, Ungal Akkiramangalil Vaadippoi, Oruvaraiyoruvar Paarththuth Thavippeergal.

24 appadiye Esekkiyel Ungalukku Adaiyaalamaaga Iruppaan; Avan Seydhapadi Ellaam Neengalumseyveergal; Ippadi Varumpodhu Naan Karththaraagiya Aandavar Endru Arindhukolveergal Endru Sol Endru Uraiththaar Endren.

25 pinnum Manupuththirane, Naan Endha Naalile Avargaludaiya Balaththaiyum, Avargaludaiya Alangaaraththin Magizhchchiyaiyum, Avargaludaiya Kangalin Viruppaththaiyum, Avargaludaiya Aaththumaavin Viseshiththa Vaanjaiyaiyum, Avargaludaiya Kumaararaiyum, Avargaludaiya Kumaaraththigalaiyum Avargalaivittu Eduththukkollugireno,
26 andha Naaliledhaane Thappivandha Oruvan Unnidaththil Vandhu Un Kaadhugal Ketka Solluvaan Allavo?

27 andha Naaliledhaane Un Vaaithirakkappattu, Nee Thappivandhavanode Pesuvaai; Ini Mavunamaayirukkamaattaai; Ippadi Nee Avargalukku Adaiyaalamaaga Iruppaai; Naan Karththar Endru Appozhudhu Arindhukolvaargal Endraar.
